duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead, inspire, and mentor a diverse team of department heads, cultivating a culture of collaboration, innovation, and accountability.
Ensure the highest level of guest satisfaction by overseeing the implementation of service standards, personalized experiences, and swift resolution of any issues.
Develop and execute strategies to maximize revenue, optimize expenses, and achieve budgetary goals.
Maintain a seamless and efficient operation by overseeing all aspects of resort management, including front office, housekeeping, food and beverage, and maintenance.
Establish strong relationships within the community, participate in Chamber of Commerce and local associations positioning the resort as an integral part of Cape Cod.
Collaborate with executive leadership to develop and execute long-term strategies that align with company objectives and drive sustainable growth.
Foster a culture of continuous learning and professional development, empowering team members to excel in their roles and advance within the organization.

education_certification.credential: Associate or Bachelor’s Degree in Business, Hospitality or a related field is preferred.
